channel.title: [*] Help with anti spam/syi [*]
channel.description: Can someone tell me: How de heck i can add anti spam/syi/null on my server? I would really appreciate if someone could help.

item.title: [*] Help with anti spam/syi [*]
item.dc:creator: @benny679 benny679
item.description:
@benny679 wrote:

I do[quote=“Daniel_, post:1, topic:337760”]Can someone tell me: How de heck i can add anti spam/syi/null on my server?
I would really appreciate if someone could help.[/quote]

I can’t think off the top of my head but there is a code you add to runserver.bat (file that runs the server) that allows you to monitor the conversation. They are popular in bubly sources.

PS wrong section
